sections.heading: Transfer of Portion of Administration of Community Block Grant Program and Michigan Main Street Program From Michigan State Housing Development Authority to Michigan Strategic Fund; Reestablishment of Board of Directors of State Land Bank Fast Track Authority Abolished by Executive Reorganization Or
sections.text: Transfer of Portion of Administration of Community Block Grant Program and Michigan Main Street Program From Michigan State Housing Development Authority to Michigan Strategic Fund; Reestablishment of Board of Directors of State Land Bank Fast Track Authority Abolished by Executive Reorganization Order No. 2014-3, MCL 124.781; Transfer of Powers and Duties From Director Under Executive Reorganization Order No. 2014-3, MCL 124.781 to Board of Directors; Amendment of Executive Reorganization Order No. 2014-6, MCL 125.1995.
